name: places/ChIJ6envdOdYwokRdtx7GTWRvz0
formattedAddress: 407 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 407 E 59th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retail chain featuring stylish brand-name apparel, shoes & accessories, plus housewares.

originalText.text: They have everything. It’s fun to just take a chance and see what you can score. It’s like a treasure hunt.  I found this adorable carry on by juicy couture I love that I get tons of compliments on and some fun new sneakers.

text.text: They have everything. It’s fun to just take a chance and see what you can score. It’s like a treasure hunt.  I found this adorable carry on by juicy couture I love that I get tons of compliments on and some fun new sneakers.

originalText.text: Love this location. They carry a wider selection of name brands and sizes compared to other locations. Also way more organized. The only flaw is that this location is a bit smaller so it can get packed but never an issue if you are not in a rush. Workers are always pleasant and lines move quickly.

text.text: Love this location. They carry a wider selection of name brands and sizes compared to other locations. Also way more organized. The only flaw is that this location is a bit smaller so it can get packed but never an issue if you are not in a rush. Workers are always pleasant and lines move quickly.

originalText.text: The store is located right next to Trader Joes which is perfectly convenient for shopping and a grocery store run. There is an upstairs and downstairs portion. All of the purses, beauty products are upstairs and everything else is downstairs. The employees are wonderful, they are helpful and hardworking. I will be returning and it is officially my fave. My flat irons were $19.99. They go up to 450 degrees.

originalText.text: This pretty T.J.Maxx under the bridge was well organized and had a nice selection in each department also two floors area . The prices is decent but some item of frenzy’s . Very friendly stuff and helpful. The it's right beside Trader Joe's…with great location!

text.text: This pretty T.J.Maxx under the bridge was well organized and had a nice selection in each department also two floors area . The prices is decent but some item of frenzy’s . Very friendly stuff and helpful. The it's right beside Trader Joe's…with great location!

originalText.text: I used to shop at least once a week before going to work because they really have new things every week and good prices!  Previously all the workers were super friendly, even the lady who is in the fitting room was a super good person and speaks Spanish!  Just today in the Jewelry department she asked them to show me something but previously I had already seen that the lady spoke Spanish so I decided to speak Spanish to her and she told me I don't speak Spanish and she always answers me in English!  I don't know what the problem is that according to her she didn't want to speak Spanish as if it were a crime!!  Not to mention the cashier, she didn't even say good morning to me or clean the area where I put the merchandise, since currently all the cashiers do that after covid!  I bought a little glass box that, because she wasn't careful, got scratched and I had to go get another one to change it and she still looked upset!!  I really don't understand if it's her job and they pay her because they don't serve with a better attitude!  Now I understand why many people choose to buy online to avoid these unpleasantries.
